DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 / THE FIRST ROUND ; SPOTLIGHT ; BETTER THAN A DIET
DOC.TEXT: Switzerland ' s team lost more_than a game Sunday at Stanford in a 2-0 loss to Colombia . According to Romania Coach Anghel Iordanescu , who was discussing the recent high_temperatures at several World Cup venues , the_Swiss weighed themselves before the game and after and had lost 36 kilograms , or about 79 pounds . MATT WHITE
